name: Empresa Nacional de InnovaciÃ³n
overview:
Empresa Nacional de InnovaciÃ³n (ENISA) is a publicly held company under the Ministry of Industry, Tourism and Trade, through the Directorate General of Small and Medium Business.

ENISA was established in 1982 and has since been developing its activities in the field of financial investments, mainly in projects in the stages of birth and growth of enterprises.

ENISA activity within the targets set by the Directorate General of SME Policy, is to provide small and medium-sized businesses tools and formulas of long-term financing to enable them to strengthen their financial structures.

In recent years, ENISA has been known for its strong promotion of the figure the equity loan, a financing instrument that provides long-term resources to companies without interfering with its management, and that applies interest rates linked to changes in the results of it, without demanding more guarantees than those of own business and professional ability of the management team.
